alert.note: Alert for Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 2:18AM CDT until July 11 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Benton, or 14 miles north of Bossier City, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ivan, Linton, Bellevue and Red Chute. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
